about.title: About RedAid
about.subtitle: Revolutionizing blood donation through technology and community

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To create a seamless, efficient, and inclusive blood donation network that saves lives by connecting donors with those in urgent need. We believe that technology can bridge the gap between donors and recipients, making blood donation more accessible and impactful.

vision.title: Our Vision
vision.description: A world where no one suffers from blood shortage, where every blood donation is utilized optimally, and where the act of giving blood is celebrated as a simple yet powerful way to save lives in every community.

compassion.title: Compassion

accessibility.title: Accessibility

story.title: Our Story
story.paragraph1: RedAid was founded with a simple yet powerful vision: to make blood donation easier, faster, and more impactful. In Bangladesh, thousands of people face life-threatening situations due to blood shortage every year. Traditional blood donation systems are often fragmented, inefficient, and difficult to navigate.
story.paragraph2: Our team recognized this critical gap and decided to leverage technology to create a unified platform. RedAid connects donors with recipients in real-time, provides transparent information, and ensures that every donation reaches the person who needs it most. Since our launch, we have helped facilitate thousands of life-saving blood transfusions.
story.paragraph3: Today, RedAid continues to grow, expanding our network of donors, hospitals, and community partners. We are committed to making blood donation a seamless, rewarding experience for everyone. With every donation facilitated through our platform, we are one step closer to a world where blood shortage is no longer a barrier to receiving critical healthcare.

q1.question: How do I register as a blood donor?
q1.answer: Click on 'Become a Donor' and fill out the registration form with your personal and medical information. You'll receive a confirmation once your profile is verified.

q2.question: How do I request blood for emergency?
q2.answer: Go to the 'Request Blood' section, provide your medical details and requirements. Our system will automatically find compatible donors and notify them.

q3.question: Is my personal information safe?
q3.answer: Yes, we use advanced encryption and security protocols to protect your data. We follow all privacy regulations and never share your information without consent.

q4.question: How often can I donate blood?
q4.answer: Generally, blood donors can donate every 56 days (8 weeks). However, always consult with your healthcare provider for personalized advice.
